content.content: I completed my BE computer engineering from Watumull college with distinction in 2015, I an finished my 12th with 58% and 10th std with 72% .
content.content1: Althought percantage doesn't matter for me since single exam paper can not decide the furture of someone. Instead hardwork will decide it..

content.heading: Technologies
